channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report I-2023100022
item.description:
Report I-2023100022

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: Boston
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 10/04/2023 this shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL BOS Service Center, 420 E Street, Boston, MA 02127. Transportation by road has been confirmed.

item.title: Report E-2023100801
item.description:
Report E-2023100801

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Contractors reported that approximately 1-gallon of "Spartan Oven and Grill Cleaner" Un1760 released inside the trailer as a result of being crushed by stacking. The crew located 8 jugs of the Spartan Oven & Grill Cleaner in 4 boxes that were damaged. The release impacted a 10’ x 1’ area of the trailer floor. The impacted area was cleaned and neutralized with citric acid and absorbents. Contractors generated a 55-gallon poly drum of waste filled with damaged jugs, the impacted pallet, and neutralized absorbents. The waste was left at the terminal to be managed by terminal personnel.
